2.subtask_description: If travel time exceeds 10 minutes, post a Slack message in general channel.

1.handles: Listing Slack channels to find general channel

2.handles: Posting message about being late if travel time is more than 10 minutes

input_vars.name: general_channel_id
input_vars.description: The ID for general Slack channel

input_vars.name: late_message_text
input_vars.description: Slack message if I am more than 10 minutes late
input_vars.value: I will be more than 10 minutes late.

output_vars.name: slack_post_result
output_vars.description: Confirmation or result of posting the Slack message
